original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2201)@</color>從武將面前召喚一個龍捲風飛往前方，將路徑上的敵人捲起並以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(2201)@</color><color=#13ccd7>智力</color>對敵人造成法術傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2201)@</color> Summon a tornado from the general to fly forward, roll up the enemy on the path and use it <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(2201)@</color><color=#13ccd7>Int</color> causes spell damage to the enemy.
